subject: Football
lead_paragraph: With Deuce McAllister thundering through the middle and Reggie Bush bouncing from one sideline to the other, New Orleans is heading to its first N.F.C. championship game Sunday in Chicago.
snippet: With Deuce McAllister thundering through the middle and Reggie Bush bouncing from one sideline to the other, New Orleans is heading to its first N.F.C. championship game Sunday in Chicago.
